update stage
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cp_name = #{cpName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cp_mobile = #{cpMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
adr_area1 = #{adrArea1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update stage set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cp_name = #{cpName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cp_mobile = #{cpMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, adr_area1 = #{adrArea1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, adr_area1_name = #{adrArea1Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, adr_area2 = #{adrArea2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, adr_area2_name = #{adrArea2Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, adr_area3 = #{adrArea3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, adr_area3_name = #{adrArea3Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, adr_detail = #{adrDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, full_addr = #{fullAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from stage where 1 = 1 and name = #{name} limit 1

select
from stage order by id desc
